Package xing.ui.core

Core rules for UI components.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Application
    Interface implemented by GUI applications.
    Axis
    Policy for configuring axis of a plot.
    Canvas
    Provides basic functions for drawing shapes.
    ColourManager
    Policy for generating colours.
    Drawable
    Subclasses must provide comply rules to be drawn onto a canvas.
    Plot
    Basic plot functions.
    Shape
    Defines how a shape should be drawn.
    SolutionPlot
    A panel can directly interpret solution as plot.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RGBColour
